hero.title: Building a skilled, adaptable, and inclusive workforce
hero.description: Access employment services, benefits, and support programs that help Australians succeed

ei.title: JobSeeker Payment
ei.description: Financial help while you're looking for work
ei.details: JobSeeker Payment is financial help if you're between 22 and Age Pension age and looking for work. You must meet residence rules and income and assets tests.

oas.title: Age Pension
oas.details: Age Pension is a payment for older Australians. You must be Age Pension age and meet residence and income and assets tests.

cpp.title: Superannuation
cpp.details: Superannuation is money set aside by your employer over your working life for you to live on when you retire from work.

jobSearch.title: Workforce Australia
jobSearch.details: Workforce Australia helps you find a job, build skills and get the support you need.

benefitsFinder.title: Payment Finder
benefitsFinder.description: Find payments and services you may be eligible for
benefitsFinder.details: Answer a few questions to get a list of payments and services you may be able to get.

chat.title: Ask EVA
chat.subtitle: Employment Virtual Assistant
chat.placeholder: How can I help you today?
